review: I received the Fire TV Stick. Installed it the same day. Fairly easy to install. All worked well. I was able to view Amazon Prime Movies and Netflix with it. I was very pleased with it until June 13 at which time it simply stopped playing the movies. When I tried to order a movie all seemed well until I hit the play button at which time I got a blue screen with the message HDCP unauthorized content detected. Tried everything but nothing has worked connected a Wii console and once again everything works so I know it is the Fire tv Stick that is defective. I would not buy this product. UNDEPENDABLE.
author: Terry Quintero
